description:
Take on all types of mountain terrain in these Alp Trainer light hiking boots. Antimicrobial treatment resists odour build-up, so your boots won't smell fierce after a long day in the heat. Lacing all the way to the toes allows you to cinch down the toebox in technical terrain, and the sturdy outsoles keep you upright on steep and varied terrain.

  • Suede leather and stretch fabric upper with GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable construction
  • Polyurethane-coated leather rand protects your foot and shoe from trail abrasion
  • Cleansport NXT organic natural odour control
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Footbeds have customizable layers at the forefoot to adapt them to a range of foot shapes
  • Outsoles are Vibram® MegaGrip for traction, secure footing and firm support
name: Salewa Alp Trainer 2 Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
